## Transform.addChild() method

Add Child Transform

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addChild(child: Transform): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  child | Transform |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

If `child` is already a child of this component, `child` will removed to the last of children list If `child` is already a child of other component, `child` will removed from its parent first
